definition: to found a country/nation-building/the foundation of PRC by Mao Zedong in 1949
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to build up the country through thrift and hard work (idiom)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Min2 zhu3 Jian4 guo2 hui4

sentences.english: It was a creed written into the founding documents that declared the destiny of a nation.
sentences.chinese: 這是載於我們的建國憲章的基本信念。

sentences.english: The old road beside the waterfall place is Jianguo Ridge, leading to Jianguo Village at the hill above.
sentences.chinese: 瀑布羣旁就是建國嶺，通往山頂的建國村。

sentences.english: The old road beside the waterfall place is Jianguo Ridge, leading to Jianguo Village at the hill above.
sentences.chinese: 瀑布羣旁就是建國嶺，通往山頂的建國村。

sentences.english: The emblem was mounted on the Tiananmen Gate on the occasion of the first anniversary of the People’s Republic.
sentences.chinese: 在建國一週年之際，國徽掛上了天安門。

sentences.english: HaoJianGuo how also think impassability cow a bud to find ZhangBeiYan stem what?
sentences.chinese: 郝建國怎樣也想不通牛一蓓去找張北雁幹什麼？

sentences.english: Since building up the country, Ming Dynasty had always suffered the Japanese pirates' invading and harassing.
sentences.chinese: 從建國開始，明朝一直深受倭寇的侵擾。

sentences.english: The Founders were protective of the fledgling democracy.
sentences.chinese: 美國的建國先賢一心要保護這個新興的民主制度。

sentences.english: And the problem is likely to get worse, warns Liu.
sentences.chinese: 劉建國警告說，這種問題可能會惡化。

sentences.english: Comrade still busy, usually with the surface live a day without statehood.
sentences.chinese: 康莉依舊忙碌，平日與鬧鬧過着沒有建國的日子。

sentences.english: Here we are, the Jianguo Hotel.
Is this the right subway to go to Jianguomen?
sentences.chinese: 這是去建國門的地鐵嗎？

sentences.english: About 100 famous actors worked for nothing on "The Founding of a Republic".
sentences.chinese: 有100名左右的知名演員免費參演了《建國大業》。

sentences.english: The No. 8 Bridge project, Jiangguo Zhong Road, Shanghai, is a concret case of the reconstruction of a factory.
sentences.chinese: 上海建國中路八號橋項目是一個工廠改建的實案。

sentences.english: I'm Chienkuo Wu from First Trading Company.
sentences.chinese: 我是第一貿易公司的吳建國。

sentences.english: It files in the face of our history and our founding principles.
sentences.chinese: 這個辦法貫穿於我們的歷史和我們的建國原則。

sentences.english: After the founding in 1953, Donglai bank into public-private partnership, Qingdao Branch.
sentences.chinese: 建國後1953年，東萊銀行併入公私合營青島分行。

definition: war of resistance, especially the war against Japan (1937-1945)
Fuxing district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei/Fuxing or Fuhsing township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Guomintang 國民黨|国民党/same as 孫逸仙|孙逸仙
to reform and open to the outside world/refers to Deng Xiaoping's policies from around 1980
